text: Allah ek misal deta hai ek to hai gulaam, jo dusre ka mamluq (slave) hai aur khud koi ikhtiyar nahin rakhta. Doosra shaks aisa hai jisey humne apni taraf se accha rizq ata kiya hai aur woh is mein se khule aur chupe khoob kharch karta hai. Batao kya yeh dono barabar hain? Alhamdulillah, magar aksar log (is seedhi baat ko) nahin jaante
